segment



Segment2f

typedef struct {
  vec2f a;
  vec2f b;
} Segment2f;
type: C struct
description: 2d segment float

Segment2d

  vec2d a;
  vec2d b;
} Segment2d;

description: 2d segment double

Segmentf

typedef struct {
  vec3f a;
  vec3f b;
} Segmentf;
type: C struct
description: 3d segment float

Segmentd

typedef struct {
  vec3d a;
  vec3d b;
} Segmentd;
type: C struct
description: 3d segment double

m_segment2_lengthd

type: C function
description: return length of segment 2d

m_segment2_points_on_same_sided

type: C function
description: check if two points (vec2) are on the same side of segment 2d
